column5: Cottage with a quiet, country setting. 30 minutes from DFW. 5 minutes to shopping, Starbucks, gas, restaurants, 15 minutes from the Texas Motor Speedway. Youâ€™ll love the cottage (1440 sq. ft) because of the coziness, serene ambience, high ceilings, pool, view of the duck pond and neighbor's horses. Cottage has private separate entrance with carport. The cottage is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with watersafe kids).
column8: Quaint, Private Cottage in Horse Country
